title: In cautarea succesului
description: Today, the internet and the world are full of definitions for success, full of content with the perfect recipe to become successful. Being surrounded by all the so-called "successful models", we forget about the most important thing: our authentic answer for our own life. In this TED talk, Medeea is proposing us a new approach to success and everyday living habits to achieve it.
author: Medeea Petrovan
